definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
Petrograd, variant spelling of 彼得堡[Bi3 de2 bao3], Saint Petersburg
First Epistle of Peter (in New Testament)
Second Epistle of Peter (in New Testament)

sentences.english: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms.
sentences.chinese: 他看见彼得约翰将要进殿，就求他们周济。

sentences.english: Let Pedrico chop it up to use in fish traps.
sentences.chinese: 他让彼得利科把它切碎了做鱼食。

sentences.english: St. Petersburg had become Petrograd in 1914.
sentences.chinese: 圣彼得堡在1914年变成彼得格勒。

sentences.english: St. Petersburg had become Petrograd in 1914.
sentences.chinese: 圣彼得堡在1914年变成彼得格勒。

sentences.english: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.
sentences.chinese: 彼得和众使徒回答说，顺从神，不顺从人，是应当的。

sentences.english: After seeing the film the heroine in it swept Peter off his feet.
sentences.chinese: 看完电影之后，电影中的女主角让彼得心驰神往。

sentences.english: Well, you know Peter, always leching after some woman or other.
sentences.chinese: 唉，你是知道彼得这个人的，他总是。

sentences.english: Jesus did this with the Apostle Peter.
sentences.chinese: 主耶稣也是这样鼓励使徒彼得。

sentences.english: Then old Peter took his big coat off and lifted down the samovar from the shelf.
sentences.chinese: 老彼得脱下大衣，从架子上拿起茶炊。

sentences.english: Peter meets Yang Cheng for the second time.
sentences.chinese: 彼得与杨成第二次见面。

sentences.english: And as Peter was beneath in the palace, there cometh one of the maids of the high priest
sentences.chinese: 彼得在下边，院子里，来了大祭司的一个使女。

sentences.english: Energy security is the theme of this year's G-8 summit in St.
sentences.chinese: 能源安全是今年圣彼得堡八国峰会的主题。

sentences.english: But Peter declared, "Even if I have to die with you, I will never disown you."
sentences.chinese: 彼得说，我就是必须和你同死，也总不能不认你。

sentences.english: Czeslaw tore the cigarette out of Piotr’s mouth.
sentences.chinese: 切斯沃夫从彼得亚雷的嘴上一把扯下香烟。

sentences.english: Mrs Hughs, this is Peter Brown.
sentences.chinese: 休斯太太，这是彼得布郎。

sentences.english: He ran behind the wall anxiously, but Peter was all right.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙跑到那堵墙后面，发现彼得安然无恙。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
